lead_paragraph: Tata Steel Ltd is still in talks with Germany's ThyssenKrupp AG about a potential merger of their European steel assets, the Indian company said on Monday.
snippet: Tata Steel Ltd is still in talks with Germany's ThyssenKrupp AG about a potential merger of their European steel assets, the Indian company said on Monday....

headline.main: North Korea Launch Could Be Test of New Attack Strategy, Japan Analysts Say
